trans-unit.source: Provides support for the behavior that enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il supporto per il comportamento che consente di [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] gli endpoint per ricevere richieste HTTP da un client AJAX ASP.NET basati su browser.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When applied to an endpoint, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene applicato a un endpoint, il comportamento di WebScriptEnablingBehavior consente [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e integrazione con ASP.NET AJAX, ad eccezione del supporto richiesto per la codifica di JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

trans-unit.source: Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> or by an appropriately configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Vari tipi di codifica, tra cui JSON, sono abilitati per <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>o da un <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> configurato in modo appropriato</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: The WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> and inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il comportamento di WebScriptEnablingBehavior il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>e che eredita da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, che consente il modello di programmazione Web più generale per [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizi che espongono endpoint non SOAP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior: - Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, il WebScriptEnablingBehavior:-attiva il modello di programmazione HTTP, inclusa la distribuzione a operazioni basate su un suffisso URL, il supporto per la selezione del verbo HTTP (POST o GET) e il controllo della durata della cache HTTP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]la programmazione HTTP del modello, vedere [HTTP Web WCF Programming Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il verbo HTTP predefinito è POST quando si utilizza questo comportamento.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: -Abilita il formattatore corretto per di richiesta e risposta messaggi ogni operazione - ad esempio, il supporto per i parametri dell'URL.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -Abilita l'endpoint JavaScript Proxy.

trans-unit.source: To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding and the WebScriptEnablingBehavior must be added to the endpoint behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: Per chiamare un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio da un client AJAX ASP.NET, il servizio deve essere configurato con il <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>associazione e il WebScriptEnablingBehavior necessario aggiungere alla raccolta di comportamento dell'endpoint.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either in configuration by adding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) directive in the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: Può eseguire questa operazione nella configurazione aggiungendo il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>o senza l'utilizzo di configurazione, attivando l'endpoint AJAX con il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>anziché la factory predefinita nella [ @ServiceHost ](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) direttiva nel file con estensione svc.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]diversi modi per abilitare un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio di rispondere ai client AJAX ASP.NET, vedere [creazione di servizi WCF per ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valore.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A>per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valore.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Applica il comportamento al client attraverso un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>metodo per visualizzare, modificare o aggiungere estensioni personalizzate alla fase di esecuzione client in tutti i messaggi utilizzati in un endpoint o per operazioni specifiche.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>che espone il contratto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>a cui è applicato il comportamento personalizzato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Applica il comportamento all'endpoint del servizio.

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: In genere, questo metodo viene chiamato [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automaticamente quando il comportamento viene applicato a un endpoint.

trans-unit.source: So there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: Non è pertanto necessario chiamare questo metodo manualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>che espone il contratto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>a cui è applicato il comportamento personalizzato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che determina se la selezione automatica del formato è abilitata.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]selezione automatica del formato, vedere [formattazione di HTTP Web WCF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la selezione del formato automatica è abilitata. in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del corpo del messaggio predefinito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value is the only <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> supported and setting any other value results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>è l'unico valore <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>supportato e l'impostazione qualsiasi altro valore comporta un <xref:System.NotSupportedException>generata.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.source: This default value is the only valid value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è l'unico valore valido.

trans-unit.source: The body style set is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Il set di stile del corpo non è supportato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing request message format.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il formato di messaggio di richiesta in uscita predefinito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing request messages.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> utilizzato dai messaggi di richiesta in uscita.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il set di formato di messaggio non è un valore valido di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response message format.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta il formato del messaggio predefinito risposta in uscita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing response messages.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> utilizzato dai messaggi di risposta in uscita.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il set di formato di messaggio non è un valore valido di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il flag che specifica se viene generata un'eccezione FaultException quando un errore server interno (codice di stato HTTP: 500) si verifica.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se il flag è abilitato; in caso contrario restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che determina se il [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Guida REST è abilitata.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]il [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pagina Guida REST, vedere [pagina della Guida del servizio di WCF Web HTTP](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Guida REST è abilitato; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Conferma che l'endpoint soddisfa i requisiti che consentono di funzionare come endpoint AJAX ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, and that the binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Verifica che l'endpoint non `null`, che utilizzi schemi HTTP o HTTPS, non utilizza il <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, utilizza verbo HTTP GET o POST, che il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>dell'associazione è impostato su <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, e che l'associazione contenga un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>in cui <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo controlla inoltre che siano intestazioni SOAP o nomi di wrapper nei metodi, né altri aspetti delle operazioni non supportati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>che espone il contratto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint non soddisfa uno dei requisiti per essere un endpoint ASP.NET AJAX.
